content.question: Taken together in context, the reference to “walls of mountains set with pine” (line 2) and the statement that “mountains wall me in” (line 9) convey the speaker’s view of the mountains as

choices.label: a sublime mystery that the speaker wishes to comprehend
a symbol of the speaker’s feelings of loneliness and deprivation
a spectacle that the speaker struggles to appreciate
a shelter that insulates the speaker from worry and trouble

content.answer: a shelter that insulates the speaker from worry and trouble

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
